content.title: Oracle
content.description: A Skyrim/Oblivion style game that saw a partially written story line and a solid code base, like many projects in this section, it was too ambitious for its own good.

content.title: Atomic Rain
content.description: A Fallout/Stalker style game set in post apocalyptia, underwent many identity changes and overhauls throughout it's life, again, too ambitious.

content.title: Quake Style Multiplayer
content.description: A joint project with a friend using Mirror for unity, friend abandoned the project and so development ceased. Acheived multiplayer and a sick looking map!

content.title: Chrome Mercenary
content.description: An intentionally generic first person shooter game that was so boring to make that development ceased, it sported half baked combat mechanics and a half made map.

content.title: Cataclysmic
content.description: Likely the titanic of Exponential Software, has likely the longest development of any project and under went countless overhauls and recreations, a moment of silence please! Sci-fi shooter game.

content.title: Celestial Rift
content.description: A Halo CE/2 inspired title with a surprisingly well made map and game mechanics, hard to make fun, may revisit this title.

content.title: Seen
content.description: Another big name that never came to fruition, underwent years of development but served as more of an experiment than production game.

content.title: StuddyBuddy.ai
content.description: A highly ambitious web app that I was creating for myself hastily just prior to HSC exams, it was a platform that allowed one-on-one tutoring with an AI tutor, a fine tuned GPT model from OPENAI API would server as your tutor.
content.engine: C# ASP Core, Js, HTML, CSS, jQuery, OpenAI API, Google App Engine

content.title: Wealth Sphere
content.description: An ambitious trading forum, sort of a joint project with a friend but realistically was all me, as I have no passion or understanding of trading, it quickly fell off.
content.engine: C# ASP Core, Js, HTML, CSS, jQuery

content.title: Impulse
content.description: A fast paced ricochet influenced game, saw the player doing stunts, parkour and trick shots.

content.title: Wellspring
content.description: A Source engine game inspired by Silent Hill, the player wakes up after crashing their car in a snowy region.

content.title: Lonely Road
content.description: A Source engine game inspired by Dear Esther.
